subprocess_flow.description: Establish automated systems to gather world performance data, evolutionary trends, and civilization progress. This involves setting up sensors, data streams, and monitoring tools that operate continuously without intervention. The collected data will be used for periodic reviews and long-term analysis.
success_criteria: Automated data collection systems are operational
Data streams are stable and reliable
subprocess_flow.purpose: To gather necessary data for monitoring world performance and evolution.
subprocess_flow.scope: Automated collection of data related to world performance, evolution, and civilization.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Implement redundant data storage and backup systems
Regular system maintenance and automated alerts

governance_requirements: Ethical guidelines for observation without intervention

change_management.change_request_process: No direct changes allowed; system updates require divine review
change_management.versioning_rules: Track all system updates and data schema changes

subprocess_flow.description: Process the raw data collected into meaningful metrics and reports. This involves cleaning, transforming, and aggregating the data to identify trends, anomalies, and significant events. The processed data will be used to generate reports on world performance, evolutionary trends, and civilization progress.
success_criteria: Data is accurately processed and transformed
Meaningful metrics and reports are generated
subprocess_flow.purpose: To transform raw data into actionable insights.
subprocess_flow.scope: Processing and transformation of raw data into meaningful metrics and reports.
end_conditions: Processed data and reports are generated

step_risks_and_controls.control: Implement data validation and error checking routines
Provide clear documentation and context for all metrics

governance_requirements: Ethical guidelines for observation without intervention

change_management.change_request_process: No direct changes allowed; algorithm updates require divine review
change_management.versioning_rules: Track all algorithm updates and data transformation changes

subprocess_flow.description: Analyze the processed data to identify long-term trends, evolutionary outcomes, and civilization achievements. This involves using statistical methods, predictive models, and AI to understand the underlying dynamics of the world. The analysis will be used to assess the overall health and sustainability of the world.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To understand the long-term dynamics of the world.
subprocess_flow.scope: Analysis of processed data to identify trends, evolutionary outcomes, and civilization achievements.
end_conditions: Long-term trends, evolutionary outcomes, and civilization achievements are identified

step_risks_and_controls.control: Use validated statistical methods and predictive models
Ensure diverse perspectives and data sources are considered

governance_requirements: Ethical guidelines for observation without intervention

change_management.change_request_process: No direct changes allowed; model updates require divine review
change_management.versioning_rules: Track all model updates and analytical changes

subprocess_flow.description: Regularly monitor evolutionary trends to detect any unforeseen consequences. This involves setting up alerts and triggers to notify relevant parties of significant events or anomalies. The monitoring will be used to ensure the world operates autonomously and sustainably.
success_criteria: Alerts are triggered for significant events
subprocess_flow.purpose: To detect unforeseen consequences of evolution.
subprocess_flow.scope: Continuous monitoring of evolutionary trends and generation of alerts.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Implement comprehensive monitoring systems and alert thresholds
Refine alert thresholds and validation processes

governance_requirements: Ethical guidelines for observation without intervention

change_management.change_request_process: No direct changes allowed; alert threshold updates require divine review
change_management.versioning_rules: Track all alert threshold updates and monitoring changes

subprocess_flow.description: Ensure intelligent life has access to data and predictive models to understand and mitigate potential collapse scenarios. This involves setting up secure data portals, educational resources, and training programs. The dissemination will empower intelligent life to make informed decisions and take proactive measures.
success_criteria: Data portals are accessible and secure
Educational resources are comprehensive and understandable
subprocess_flow.purpose: To empower intelligent life to understand and mitigate potential collapse scenarios.
subprocess_flow.scope: Dissemination of data and predictive models to intelligent life.
triggers: Identification of long-term trends, evolutionary outcomes, and civilization achievements
end_conditions: Data portals, educational resources, and training programs are established

step_risks_and_controls.control: Implement data access controls and ethical guidelines

governance_requirements: Ethical guidelines for observation without intervention

change_management.change_request_process: No direct changes allowed; content updates require divine review
change_management.versioning_rules: Track all content updates and access control changes
